mean_cn: n. 腰带，妇女紧身褡；  v. 围，包围，环绕
mean_en: a tight piece of clothing worn especially in the past by women under other clothes to make the area around the waist look thinner
word_etyma: gird束缚+le表示做某种动作时所使用的东西 →带，腰带
sentence: The sumo wrestler wears a large leather girdle.
sentence_trans: 这位相扑手系着大块皮质腰带。
